notes: Generated purely for quality matrix testing

inputs.q1_core_what: A CLI for deploying Next.js apps to AWS Lambda
inputs.q2_moment: Developer is tired of configuring TerraForm manually.
inputs.q3_url_or_desc: Terminal, dark mode, monospace ascii art.

inputs.q1_core_what: An API for verifying email addresses in real-time
inputs.q2_moment: Spam signups overlap legitimate users. This API fixes it.
inputs.q3_url_or_desc: Clean usage dashboard, green status lights.

inputs.q2_moment: Python is slow, linting is slow. This makes it instant.
SQL is hard to read. This makes it a graph.
inputs.q3_url_or_desc: Nodes and edges, dark background, neon lines.

inputs.q1_core_what: AI code reviewer that runs locally
inputs.q2_moment: Privacy concerns with cloud AI. This runs on your GPU.
inputs.q3_url_or_desc: Shield icon, lock, local hardware aesthetic.

inputs.q2_moment: Merge conflicts are scary. This gamifies them.

inputs.q1_core_what: SDK for adding multiplayer to any app
inputs.q2_moment: Websockets are hard. This is a drop-in hook.
Janky animations kill retention. This finds the bottleneck.
K8s is complicated. This makes it look like a video game HUD.
Grepping logs is painful. This lets you ask questions.
inputs.q3_url_or_desc: Search bar, clean typography, white background.

inputs.q2_moment: Fixes json.
Alerts when down.
